pluginstrument.author: Sim Innovations
pluginstrument.description:
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION - https://simstrumentation.com
GFC 500 Autopilot module
Version info: - **v1.11** - 2022-12-21 - VNAV for Vision Jet added - **v1.1** - 2022-12-20 - Graphics update - Added backlighting - **v1.0** - 2022-12-11
NOTES: - Should work in most aircraft with a GFC500 or similar autopilot. - Yaw Damper button can be hidden or shown to match your plane's AP module via user property - Thumb wheel can be selected to work with Knobster from user property
